attributes.action: Demand for a totally independent inquiry into the Child Sexual Exploitation in Rotherham
attributes.additional_details:
WE THE  ROTHERHAM PUBLIC DEMAND :

A FULLY INDEPENDENT OPEN & TRANSPARENT INQUIRY OPEN TO PUBLIC INSPECTION AND TERMS OF REFERENCE TO THIS INQUIRY SET BY A TOTALLY INDEPENDENT PERSON NOT EMPLOYED BY OR HAVING ANY LINKS WITH RMBC OR SYP INTO THE CHILD GROOMING COVER UP SCANDAL BY ROTHERHAM BOROUGH COUNCIL AND SOUTH YORKSHIRE POLICE INCLUDING PAST AND PRESENT OFFICERS AND MEMBERS INVOLVED.

Rotherham people now demand the full truth, with no more cover ups. We have all had enough of the lies and deceit of those in the institutions which we have empowered.
